item.name: Painting
item.description: The gold plated label below the painting has the name of the artist and says the medium is oil paint. Assassin: [That's not oil paint. It's acrylic. C'mon people, learn the difference; I'm a goddamn assassin, and even I know the difference.] Assassin: ... Assassin: [Well, at least there's no way to set this thing on fire.]
